STORY LINE:
This film follows the &#039;life&#039; and times of the lead character, an android who 
is purchased as a household robot programmed to perform menial tasks. Within a 
few days the Martin family realizes that they don&#039;t have an ordinary droid as 
Andrew begins to experience emotions and creative thought. In a story that spans 
two centuries, Andrew learns the intricacies of humanity while trying to stop 
those who created him from destroying him.
